Dependencies
=============

Requires Python: >=3.9, <3.14

Packages
--------

- ``emucore-direct ==1.0.7; python_version <'3.11'``
- ``eqc-direct ==2.0.2; python_version <'3.11'``
- ``numpy >=1.22.1, <2``
- ``networkx >=2.6.3, <3``
- ``pandas >=2.1.0, <3``
- ``scikit-learn >=1.2.1, <2``
- ``lightgbm >= 4.6.0, <5``
- ``xgboost >= 1.7.4, <2``
- ``qci-client>=5, <6``
